#summary Mark a user account as offline (if it is not already).
#labels Protocol-User

This is a read-write method like GetPresence. It will set the `SessionID`, `SecureSessionID`, and `CurrentRegionID` user data fields to UUID.Zero.

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||RemovePresence||String||Yes||
||`UserID`||UUID of the user to mark as offline||UUID||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=RemovePresence
&UserID=efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if the was marked as offline or was already offline, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":"true",
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":"false",
    "Message":"User does not exist"
}
}}}
